mapper.select: SELECT 'jxb' id, count(1) value FROM jxb WHERE deptId =#{deptId} union all SELECT 'rpt' id, count(1) rpt FROM jxb_rpt inner join jxb on jxb_rpt.rid=jxb.id WHERE jxb.deptId =#{deptId} union all SELECT 'cmt' id, count(1) cmt FROM jxb_cmt inner join jxb_rpt on jxb_rpt.id=jxb_cmt.rptId inner join jxb on jxb_rpt.rid=jxb.id WHERE jxb.deptId =#{deptId} union all SELECT 'msg' id, count(1) msg FROM jxb_msg inner join jxb on jxb_msg.rid=jxb.id WHERE jxb.deptId =#{deptId}
